languages.text: "Хейнрикс верно отметил важность бумаг. Если у леди Моллес-Секандас нет нужной справки, то имущество переходит по наследству ее детям. По причине смерти ответчика дело закрыто".
languages.translation_comment:
Стартует этюд VC_MollesWin
выдать всем колониям эфф+
Никого не казним
Весы в равновесии

languages.text: "Heinrix is right about the importance of paperwork. If Lady Molles-Secundas does not have the certificate in question, her children will inherit her property. The case is hereby closed due to the defendant's demise."

languages.text: "Heinrix hat recht, was die Bedeutung von Papierkram angeht. Sollte Lady Molles-Secundas das fragliche Zertifikat nicht vorweisen können, geht Ihr Besitz auf ihre Kinder über. Der Fall ist hiermit wegen des Ablebens des Angeklagten geschlossen."
languages.original_text: "Heinrix is right about the importance of paperwork. If Lady Molles-Secundas does not have the certificate in question, her children will inherit her property. The case is hereby closed due to the defendant's demise."

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix hat recht, was die Bedeutung von Papierkram angeht. Sollte Lady Molles-Secundas das fragliche Zertifikat nicht vorweisen können, geht Ihr Besitz auf ihre Kinder über. Der Fall ist hiermit wegen des Ablebens des Angeklagten geschlossen."

languages.text: « Comme Heinrix l'a fait remarquer, les documents officiels sont d'une importance capitale. Si dame Molles-Secundas ne détient pas le certificat en question, ses enfants hériteront de sa propriété. L'affaire est donc close du fait de la mort de la plaignante. »
languages.original_text: "Heinrix is right about the importance of paperwork. If Lady Molles-Secundas does not have the certificate in question, her children will inherit her property. The case is hereby closed due to the defendant's demise."

traits.locale_text: « Comme Heinrix l'a fait remarquer, les documents officiels sont d'une importance capitale. Si dame Molles-Secundas ne détient pas le certificat en question, ses enfants hériteront de sa propriété. L'affaire est donc close du fait de la mort de la plaignante. »

languages.text: “海因里希的看法没错，文书工作非常重要。如果莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人无法通过法律文书证明自己还活着，那她的子嗣有权继承她的遗产。由于被告已经死亡，本案就此结案。”
languages.original_text: "Heinrix is right about the importance of paperwork. If Lady Molles-Secundas does not have the certificate in question, her children will inherit her property. The case is hereby closed due to the defendant's demise."

traits.locale_text: “海因里希的看法没错，文书工作非常重要。如果莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人无法通过法律文书证明自己还活着，那她的子嗣有权继承她的遗产。由于被告已经死亡，本案就此结案。”

languages.text: «Heinrix tiene razón sobre la importancia de la documentación. Si lady Molles-Secundas no tiene el certificado en cuestión, sus hijos heredarán la propiedad. El caso queda cerrado por la muerte del acusado».
languages.original_text: "Heinrix is right about the importance of paperwork. If Lady Molles-Secundas does not have the certificate in question, her children will inherit her property. The case is hereby closed due to the defendant's demise."

traits.locale_text: «Heinrix tiene razón sobre la importancia de la documentación. Si lady Molles-Secundas no tiene el certificado en cuestión, sus hijos heredarán la propiedad. El caso queda cerrado por la muerte del acusado».

languages.text: 「ハインリックスの言う通り、書類仕事は重要である。レディ・モレス・セクンダスが問題の証明書を持っていなければ、彼女の子供たちが彼女の財産を相続することになる。被告が死亡したため、本件を終了する」
languages.original_text: "Heinrix is right about the importance of paperwork. If Lady Molles-Secundas does not have the certificate in question, her children will inherit her property. The case is hereby closed due to the defendant's demise."

traits.locale_text: 「ハインリックスの言う通り、書類仕事は重要である。レディ・モレス・セクンダスが問題の証明書を持っていなければ、彼女の子供たちが彼女の財産を相続することになる。被告が死亡したため、本件を終了する」

languages.text: "Heinrix, evrakların ne kadar önemli olduğu konusunda haklı. Leydi Molles-Secundas, söz konusu belgeye sahip değilse tüm mülkünü çocukları miras alacak. Dava, davalının vefatı dolayısıyla kapanmıştır."
languages.original_text: "Heinrix is right about the importance of paperwork. If Lady Molles-Secundas does not have the certificate in question, her children will inherit her property. The case is hereby closed due to the defendant's demise."

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix, evrakların ne kadar önemli olduğu konusunda haklı. Leydi Molles-Secundas, söz konusu belgeye sahip değilse tüm mülkünü çocukları miras alacaktır. Dava, davalının vefatı dolayısıyla kapanmıştır."
